mapper.select: SELECT perform_appraisal_objects_id, performance_appraisal_id, appraisal_object_id, appraisal_principal_id, appraisal_principal_name, evaluation_score, appraisal_result_id, appraisal_result, appraisal_object_status, sort, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM performance_appraisal_objects WHERE perform_appraisal_objects_id=#{performAppraisalObjectsId} and delete_flag=0

SELECT pao.perform_appraisal_objects_id, pao.performance_appraisal_id, pao.appraisal_object_id, pao.appraisal_principal_id, ifnull((evaluation_score), 0.00 ) AS evaluation_score, pao.appraisal_result_id, pao.sort, pao.appraisal_object_status, pao.appraisal_principal_name, pao.delete_flag, pao.create_by, pao.create_time, pao.update_by, pao.update_time, pas.appraisal_object_name, pas.appraisal_object_code, pas.department_id, pas.department_name, pas.post_id, pas.post_name, pas.official_rank_system_id, pas.official_rank, pas.official_rank_name FROM performance_appraisal_objects pao LEFT JOIN perform_appraisal_object_snap pas ON pao.perform_appraisal_objects_id = pas.perform_appraisal_objects_id AND pas.delete_flag=0 WHERE pao.delete_flag=0 AND pao.performance_appraisal_id = #{performanceAppraisalId} ORDER BY pao.evaluation_score,pao.sort

SELECT prf.performance_rank_name, IFNULL(prf.bonus_factor,0) as bonus_factor, prf.performance_rank_factor_id, prf.performance_rank_id FROM performance_appraisal_objects pao left join performance_appraisal pa on pao.performance_appraisal_id = pa.performance_appraisal_id and pa.delete_flag =0
left join performance_rank_factor prf on prf.performance_rank_factor_id =pao.appraisal_result_id and prf.delete_flag =0 WHERE pao.delete_flag=0 and pa.appraisal_status=4 and pa.appraisal_object=2 and pao.appraisal_object_id =#{employeeId} ORDER BY pao.update_time DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT pao.perform_appraisal_objects_id, pao.performance_appraisal_id, pao.appraisal_object_id, pao.appraisal_principal_id, ifnull(evaluation_score,0.00) as evaluation_score, pao.appraisal_result_id, pao.sort, pao.appraisal_object_status, pao.appraisal_principal_name pao.delete_flag, pao.create_by, pao.create_time, pao.update_by, pao.update_time, pas.appraisal_object_name, pas.appraisal_object_code, pas.department_id, pas.department_name, pas.post_id, pas.post_name, pas.official_rank_system_id, pas.official_rank, pas.official_rank_name FROM performance_appraisal_objects pao LEFT JOIN perform_appraisal_object_snap pas ON pao.perform_appraisal_objects_id = pas.perform_appraisal_objects_id AND pas.delete_flag=0 WHERE pao.delete_flag=0 ORDER BY pao.evaluation_score,pao.sort

SELECT performance_rank_factor_id, performance_rank_id, performance_rank_name, bonus_factor, sort, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM performance_rank_factor where delete_flag=0 and performance_rank_id=#{performanceRankId}

SELECT prf.performance_rank_name, IFNULL(prf.bonus_factor,0) as bonus_factor, prf.performance_rank_factor_id, prf.performance_rank_id FROM performance_appraisal_objects pao left join performance_appraisal pa on pao.performance_appraisal_id = pa.performance_appraisal_id and pa.delete_flag =0
left join performance_rank_factor prf on prf.performance_rank_factor_id =pao.appraisal_result_id and prf.delete_flag =0 WHERE pao.delete_flag=0 and pa.appraisal_status=4 and pa.appraisal_object=1 and pao.appraisal_object_id =#{departmentId} ORDER BY pao.update_time DESC LIMIT 3
